infos.value: Stop!
Engelbert...did you not hear me?
Do not give me orders.
Only King Robb has that right.
Darling, be nice...
Are you still so convinced that we are enemies?
I am not yet convinced that you are allies.
...Are you really friends with Schuzelt?
What did you say!?
If you wish to rescue Schuzelt as soon as possible, we should coordinate our efforts—
I know what your motives are.
What...
Abducting Lady Machérie, extending your own life by making a victim of Schuzelt...
You're after the throne of Hourne.
Do not mock me!
If you so dearly wish to disrupt the peace between our armies...
Oh, are you challenging me? Say the word and I'll accept.
...What? Chickening out?
If you won't make a move...then I will!!
...What!?
Who dares!?
This black scarf... It can't be...Mother's?
"Mother's"...?
But we were told that Queen Helena had lost her life...
She's alive...
...I see.
...Engelbert?
Darling's parents were... In the war, they—
Do not speak of what doesn't concern you.
...I suppose you and I both know there is no such thing as a life well lost on the battlefront.
Thank you...
Engelbert... Please, I entreat you to lend your strength.
I am as I stand before you.
...Why do you bow your head to me?
I wish to free Machérie—and Schuzelt—as soon as possible.
I will do anything to achieve that. So please...
...Darling.
...Fine. My shield is yours, but only until the two of them are freed.
Understood. You have my gratitude.
